channel.title: software-design on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in software-design on My New Hugo Site

item.title: DDD - The Joke That Made Me LOL
item.description: Last night I asked one of my developer friends, during our not so regular Diablo III sessions, if he’d heard of DDD. We usually talk about various software development topics and concepts, sharing insights, ideas, and sometimes discussing some principles down to implementation details, while just running around in circles in previously cleared parts of the map. It’s hard fighting monsters and focusing on interesting software discussion at the same time…
